1588130.name: MAZE: A VR Adventure
1588130.description:
"MAZE: A VR Adventure" is a roguelite horror game.

Lose yourself into the darkness of a procedurally generated maze in order to get out alive.

Explore the maze in search of spells that can help you in your quest for the exit and beware of the creatures that inhabit it.

Fight or escape from the creatures you will encounter on your path.

Keep your eyes opened to avoid falling into the traps scattered throughout the maze.

Choose between 4 different game modes:
  • Classic: An endless mode that will allow you to challenge increasingly larger mazes where you will have to extricate yourself from traps and increasingly numerous of monsters level after level.
  • Safe: No traps or creatures that can harm you, choose how big the maze is and explore it until you find the exit.
  • Solo Homo Octopus: Choose the size of the maze and immerse yourself in this dangerous adventure, but be careful you will not be alone. Can you find the end of the maze by hiding from the lord of this land?
  • Run Against Time: * Under Development * Choose the size of maze and start running, can you find the end of the maze before the time runs out?

Features:
  • Procedural generated levels
  • Unique Monsters
  • Horror Atmosphere
  • "Arm swing" or "Gamepad" locomotion system

HTC Vive or Oculus Rift are required to play this game.


Feel free to get lost.


Translations by:
Russian - Daniil Vologodskiy
Spanish - Pablo Tibis
1588130.supported_languages: 英语, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
